summary: The diff updates frontend/src/index.css theme CSS variables for both light and dark modes to a light-blue (sky blue) + black/near-black direction, including primary, background/foreground, ring, accent, muted, border/input, and chart tokens. Two additional project metadata/summary files were also modified, which were not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added repository documentation/metadata summaries not required for the theme change (frontend-file-summaries.txt).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for updating global theme tokens in frontend/src/index.css; it does not request updating summary files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project state tracking metadata (project_state.json) including unrelated mention of a 'photo upload' request.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is limited to applying the light-blue + black theme; modifying project_state.json and referencing other requests is outside scope.
